title: Our hundred days in Europe;
author: Holmes, Oliver Wendell
snippet: In saying that the exterior of Salisbury Ca thedral is more interesting than its interior, I was perhaps unfair to the latter, which only yields to the surpassing claims of the wonderful structure as seen from the outside.
